title: adidas Men's Standard Length Graphic Swim Shorts
features: Men's graphic swim shorts made with recycled materials
REGULAR FIT: Strikes a comfortable balance between loose and snug
EASY STORAGE: Mesh side pockets hold small items
MADE WITH RECYCLED CONTENT: Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste
description: Stand out from the crowd in these men's swim shorts. They're made with an allover geometric print that incorporates the adidas Badge of Sport to create a bold design. Soft, lightweight and chlorine-resistant, they're equally at home in the water as at the volleyball net.
